scenario_text.value:
Where did she come from?
Didn’t you check, Dracumon?!

Hang on! She definitely wasn’t there in front
of us! What magic is she using?

My, my. Aren’t you cruel, putting all blame
on him like that?

I can easily slip past your vision when I
choose to do so, don’t you understand?

Archnemon... You’ve finally decided to take
us on directly?

Hehehe, and perfect timing, too. I had just
been thinking of heading your way.

Here you were, plodding along, coming to
be captured? How foolish in the extreme!
What?! We’re being attacked?!
As if! Get behind me, Miu!
Let go of me, Kaito!

Hang on, Archnemon! You said you wanted to
capture us?

You don’t want us dead? You plan to capture
and use us in some way?

That was perhaps a slip of the tongue, but
aren’t you clever, little child!

You keep putting weird ideas in each
other’s heads to befoul my plans!

That’s not our fault! You only have yourself
to blame!

You attack indiscriminately and then deny
responsibility! That is why your plans fail!
How very dare you!
We won’t forgive you, Archnemon!

I’ll wipe that smirk off your face
permanently!
Kewww!!!

Well, well... If it isn’t little sleepy head?
And the lonely leader!

Shall I show you another vision? Perhaps
a dream of happy bliss this time?

Yeah, no. We ain’t scared of your tricks and
traps any more.

You’ve looked down on us long enough.
You’re just a coward, hiding in the shadows.
Get ready to die!

You think it will be that easy? You are all
about to disappear!

Just as the other two disappeared.
Begging and crying as they went!
I don’t think so.
You seem awfully calm about this.
You did take us by surprise.
But we are not yours to command!
What... What is happening?

But this was my last chance...
My very last chance!
Your last chance?
It’s all your fault!

My life, my world! I cannot let you escape
any longer!
(Her life and world?)

(Is there a reason why Archnemon has
attacked us?)
(If so, then...maybe we can negotiate?)

(We don’t have to be friends, but we might be
able to avoid a battle...)
(Should I try talking?)
(How to deal with Archnemon...)
Let’s fight!
Ask for cooperation.
Find a way to escape.
Let’s fight.

(It’s no good. Making an ally of someone you
can’t trust is too risky.)
Everyone look out! They’re coming!

No matter what happens, you won’t be
kidnapping these kids!
Ask for cooperation.

So, would it help you if we found a way to
cooperate?
What are you talking about, Takuma?!

If some kind of positive result could come
from our joining forces...

We could avoid a fight. Can’t you tell us
more about your situation?
What’s this? How kind you are...

Why don’t you come over here, then.
Our Master has need of you all.
Wait! Don’t do it, Takuma!
Wah!

That was close! If Agumon hadn’t yelled,
it would have captured you, Takuma.

Idiots! There’s no way we can negotiate with
that!
Here she comes! Get ready!
Find a way to escape.
Can you tell us what you’re after?

Takuma? Are you thinking you can negotiate
with Archnemon?

Be quiet. When I draw her attention, all of
you are going to escape.
What?! But...

Wasn’t it you who said you didn’t want to
stay here?

Archnemon is tough. We need to fight from
a better tactical position...
Aren’t we past the time for negotiations?

I don’t know what you’re up to, but I have
nothing to tell you!
Damn, here it comes! Get ready!
